text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in DispensableDrugForm
  • Import all the codes that are contained in AdministrableDrugForm
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-orderableDrugForm

name: OrderableDrugForm
title: OrderableDrugForm
